name: Lurking (Jirushi)
description:
Short game made for Trijam.
After a full day of working on a game for the Lux Jam, I saw there were still 4 hours left to Trijam.
So I said to myself "What a good opportunity to make a second jam in one day!".
My sleep is ruined, but I have no regrets.

Controls:

WASD to move.
